actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 20, 1976, relating to payments to local governments based upon certain public lands within the boundaries of the jurisdiction of such governments, to include payments for lands on which are located a bombing range utilized primarily by aircraft stationed outside of the State in which the range is located.

summary.text: Entitles any local government to payments by the Secretary of the Interior based on the amount of land located within its jurisdiction which is utilized as a bombing range primarily by aircraft stationed out of State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 20, 1976, relating to payments to local governments based upon certain public lands within the boundaries of the jurisdiction of such governments, to include payments for lands on which are located a bombing range utilized primarily by aircraft stationed outside of the State in which the range is located.
